item.title: MIUI OS1.0.8.0.UNNJPXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14T Pro Japan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14T Pro Japan

Codename: rothko

Version: OS1.0.8.0.UNNJPXM | 14.0

Size: 7.5 GB

MD5: 63a8f8a9883ff96c26f3a9f4c4517bd8

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.102.0.VNNTWXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14T Pro Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14T Pro Taiwan

Codename: rothko

Version: OS2.0.102.0.VNNTWXM | 15.0

Size: 6.1 GB

MD5: 48c570eee558d21176c312b20081c6eb

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Frame rate wasn't always displayed correctly in Game Turbo
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.
[Gallery]
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
